channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenVPN -- tap-windows6
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenVPN -- tap-windows6

item.title: CVE-2024-1305|2024-08-01T18:33:25.379Z -- openvpn -- tap-windows6
item.description: tap-windows6 driver version 9.26 and earlier does not properly check the size data of incomming write operations which an attacker can use to overflow memory buffers, resulting in a bug check and potentially arbitrary code execution in kernel space
